ViewRange.Description: The range from which the target will be seen. If zero, sight will be disabled.

ViewSector.Description: The view sector within which the target needs to be to be seen.

HearingRange.Description: The range from which the target will be heard. If zero, hearing will be disabled.

AbsoluteDetectionRange.Description: The range at which a target is guaranteed to be detected. If zero, absolute detection will be disabled.

FleeRange.Description: How far to try and get away when fleeing.

ChanceToBeAlertedWhenFlockAlerted.Description: Percentage chance to engage in combat if another flock member engages a target.

AlertedRange.Description: A range within which the target can be seen/sensed when the NPC is alerted to their presence. Should be higher than sense ranges.

AlertedTime.Description: How long to wait in an alerted or threatening state before switching to active combat.

MaintainDistanceWhileAlerted.Description: Whether or not to maintain distance and strafe while in the alerted state.

AlertedRelativeForwardsSpeed.Description: Relative movement speed when moving forwards or strafing while in the alerted state. Only applies if MaintainDistanceWhileAlerted is true.

AlertedStrafingDurationRange.Description: How long to strafe for when in the alerted state. Only applies if MaintainDistanceWhileAlerted is true.

AlertedStrafingFrequencyRange.Description: How frequently to strafe when in the alerted state. Only applies if MaintainDistanceWhileAlerted is true.

FleeIfNotThreatened.Description: Whether to flee while in the alerted state if not threatened after AlertedTime expires.

ThreatenAnimation.Description: An optional animation to play to threaten the target before initiating combat.

ThreatenDelayRange.Description: Delay before the threaten animation is played.

RunThreshold.Description: At what ratio NPC switches to run animation e.g MaxSpeed is 10, at RunThreshold 0.55 NPC will run at speed 5.5.

Chase.Description: Whether the NPC will chase the target during combat.

ChaseRelativeSpeed.Description: Relative chasing speed when pursuing a target.

CombatMovingRelativeSpeed.Description: Relative speed to use during combat specific movement (e.g. to achieve slower strafing).

DayTimePeriod.Description: The hour range considered to be daytime for this NPC.

DayTimeNapWeight.Description: Weight used to determine if the NPC should have a short nap during the day. Set to 0 to disable.

DayTimeNapTimeRange.Description: How long a daytime nap should last.

TimidDuringDay.Description: Whether this NPC is a bit more timid during the day.

AlwaysSleepAtNight.Description: Whether this NPC always sleeps through the whole night.

NightFlavorAnimation.Description: A flavor animation to play at night. Ignored if null or empty.

NightFlavorAnimationLength.Description: How long to play the night flavor animation.

DayFlavorAnimation.Description: A flavor animation to play during the day. Ignored if null or empty.

DayFlavorAnimationLength.Description: How long to play the daytime flavor animation.

FlockArray.Description: Array containing NPCs for this flock type.

AttackPauseRange.Description: The range for absolute minimum time before an NPC can execute a second attack.

CombatRelativeTurnSpeed.Description: Modifier that decides turn speed difference in combat.

CombatBehaviorDistance.Description: The distance within which to switch from smart chasing to combat-oriented movement behavior.

CombatAlwaysMovingWeight.Description: Weight for the combat movement behavior where the npcs will always chharge at you,put 0 to disable.

CombatDirectWeight.Description: Weight for the direct combat movement behavior (i.e. just going straight at the target, maintaining a close distance and attacking. Set to 0 to disable.

CombatStrafeWeight.Description: Weight for the combat strafing movement behavior. Set to 0 to disable.

CombatAttackPreDelay.Description: The time delay range before the NPC performs an attack, provided it's in attack range.

CombatAttackPostDelay.Description: The time delay range after the NPC performs an attack, provided it's in attack range.

CombatStrafingDurationRange.Description: How long to strafe for when in the combat strafing movement behavior. Only applies if CombatStrafeWeight is greater than 0.

CombatStrafingFrequencyRange.Description: How frequently to strafe when in the combat strafing movement behavior. Only applies if CombatStrafeWeight is greater than 0.

CombatBackOffAfterAttack.Description: Whether to back off after performing an attack.

CombatBackOffDistanceRange.Description: How far to back off after performing an attack. Max should be lower than the CombatBehaviorDistance.

CombatBackOffDurationRange.Description: How long to back off for after performing an attack.

BlockAbility.Description: The interaction to use for blocking when backing away. Set to empty to disable blocking.

BlockProbability.Description: The probability this NPC will block when backing away if a BlockAbility is set.

AdditionalCombatBehaviorMacroElement.Description: An optional macro element for supplying more bespoke combat movement behavior. Weight for the behavior must be internally defined in the macro element.

BlockStepDetectionBlockSet.Description: Optional blockset that this NPC will passively detect steps on.

BlockStepDetectionRange.Description: Detection range for the block step detection.

BlockStepDetectionIncludePlayers.Description: Whether block steps from players will be detected.

BlockStepDetectionIncludeNPCs.Description: Whether block steps from NPCs will be detected.

BlockStepDetectionRelativeSpeed.Description: The relative motion speed at which the NPC will investigate a stepped block

BlockStepDetectionIgnoreGroups.Description: The NPC groups whose steps will be ignored.

ClimbHeight.Description: The maximum climb height, in blocks.

AscentAnimationType.Description: Animation when climbing up. Options: Walk, Jump, Climb, Fly, Idle.

DescendSpeedCompensation.Description: Factor to compensate forward speed reduction while moving downwards.

DescendFlatness.Description: Relative scale how fast NPC moves forward while climbing down.

DescentSteepness.Description: The relative steepness of the descent.

DescentBlending.Description: Blending of the descent pattern. 0 is linear, higher values more curved.

LeashDistance.Description: The range after which an NPC will start to want to return to their spawn point.

LeashMinPlayerDistance.Description: The minimum distance from the player before the NPC will be willing to give up on the chase.

LeashTimer.Description: How long the NPC must be more than the minimum distance form the player and too far from leash before giving up.

HardLeashDistance.Description: An absolute maximum from the the leash position the NPC can go before turning back.

LeashRelativeSpeed.Description: The relative speed at which the NPC will return to its leash position

ConfusedTimeRange.Description: How long the NPC should act confused for when losing its target before beginning the search. While confused the NPC detection range is lowered.

SearchTimeRange.Description: How long the NPC should actively search for its lost target before giving up and going back to idle.

DisableDamageGroups.Description: Groups not to take damage from.

IsMemory.Description: Defines if the NPC is a memory

MemoriesCategory.Description: Defines the category of the memory

MemoriesNameOverride.Description: Overrides the memory name if set

BreathesInWater.Description: Whether this NPC can breathe underwater.

NameTranslationKey.Description: Translation key for NPC name display

Switch to combat state if any flock member engages a target.
React to sudden incoming damage.
If there's someone who could have caused the damage, target them.
If the damage was from an unknown source, panic to try and get away.
Check if there are any potential threats nearby
Block step detection
